D

debug() - Static method in class mangan.Simulator
Returns the current debug state. true = on, false = off.
deployAlgorithm(int) - Method in class mangan.Visualisation
Radiobutton calls this method to set the deployment algorithm.
DeployAngularSpiral - Class in mangan
Deploys an amount of robots following an angular spiral pattern, the robots are equally distributed over the length of the complete spiral
DeployAngularSpiral() - Constructor for class mangan.DeployAngularSpiral
 
DeployBadCenters - Class in mangan
Deploys an amount of robots throwing two gaussian distributions randomly spread on the map, but forcing the center of the gaussian functions to be quite distant, so we can test the behavior of the robots in two irregular groups.
DeployBadCenters() - Constructor for class mangan.DeployBadCenters
 
DeployCircle - Class in mangan
Deploys an amount of robots following a circle pattern where every robots keeps the distance with the inner and outer layer or perimeter as well as the other robots in its layer.
DeployCircle() - Constructor for class mangan.DeployCircle
 
DeployGauss - Class in mangan
Deploys an amount of robots in random positions following a Gaussian distribution , using a predefined Mean and Variance
DeployGauss() - Constructor for class mangan.DeployGauss
 
DeploymentContext - Class in mangan
Strategy pattern pseudo class.
DeploymentContext(DeploymentStrategy) - Constructor for class mangan.DeploymentContext
Constructor needs a DeploymentStrategy.
DeploymentStrategy - Interface in mangan
Strategy pattern interface for deployment strategies.
DeployRandom - Class in mangan
Deploys an amount of robots in random positions within the given sea limits.
DeployRandom() - Constructor for class mangan.DeployRandom
 
deployRobots(int, int) - Method in class mangan.DeployAngularSpiral
 
deployRobots(int, int) - Method in class mangan.DeployBadCenters
Deploy robots in a way where some sort of groups are created to check the usage of such a deployment.
deployRobots(int, int) - Method in class mangan.DeployCircle
 
deployRobots(int, int) - Method in class mangan.DeployGauss
 
deployRobots(int, int) - Method in class mangan.DeploymentContext
Deploy this amount of robots with a viewing range of distance.
deployRobots(int, int) - Method in interface mangan.DeploymentStrategy
This has to be implemented by every deployment algorithm.
deployRobots(int, int) - Method in class mangan.DeployRandom
 
deployRobots(int, int) - Method in class mangan.DeploySpiral
 
deployRobots(int, int) - Method in class mangan.DeploySquare
 
deployRobots(int, int) - Static method in class mangan.Simulator
Method to deploy robots with the chosen algorithm.
DeploySpiral - Class in mangan
Deploys an amount of robots following a archimedean spiral pattern with 4 circles.
DeploySpiral() - Constructor for class mangan.DeploySpiral
 
DeploySquare - Class in mangan
Deploys an amount of robots following a filled squared pattern.
DeploySquare() - Constructor for class mangan.DeploySquare
 
display() - Method in class mangan.VisualRobot
If one calls this, the robot object is drawn to the GUI.
divide(int) - Method in class mangan.Coordinates
To divide two Coordinates with each other.
draw() - Method in class mangan.Visualisation
Processings draw() runs forevery and renders all the GUI.
drawRobots() - Method in class mangan.Visualisation
Draws every robot by calling it's display() method as long as we have at least one robot.
drawRobotsFirstTime() - Method in class mangan.Visualisation
Draws all the robots from the simulator objects as soon as we push the start button.
drawStats() - Method in class mangan.Visualisation
Draws the statistics which are relevant for the informaticup.
